column2: Elizabeth! I am sorry for the long wait for your pizza. How the pre-ordering works is that we begin making your order as soon as you're seated. We are unable to do it prior to you getting a table because we're unable to properly time the wait precisely enough to ensure that your pizza arrives to you fully cooked and still hot. I apologize that the pizza was forgotten causing an additional wait. I'd like to have a manager follow-up with you to discuss your experience and restore your faith in our quality of service and food.
